languages.text: "Химкнязья спешно созывают ополчения и готовятся выступить в очистительный поход. Они ожидают благословения Вашей Светлости".
"The Chem-Princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s blessing."
languages.original_text: "Химкнязья спешно созывают ополчения и готовятся выступить в очистительный поход. Они ожидают благословения Вашей Светлости".

traits.locale_text: "The Chem-princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They are waiting for Your Grace's blessing."
"The Chem-princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They are waiting for Your Grace's blessing."
"The Chem-princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They await Your Grace's blessing."

"The Chem-Princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s blessing."

languages.text: «Los Quimiopríncipes están reuniendo a sus milicias y preparando una cruzada purificadora. Solo esperan el beneplácito de mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: "The Chem-Princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s blessing."

traits.locale_text: «Los Quimiopríncipes están reuniendo a sus milicias y preparando una cruzada purificadora. Solo esperan el beneplácito de mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: « Les chimioprinces rassemblent leurs milices à la hâte et se préparent à lancer une croisade purificatrice. Ils attendent la bénédiction de Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: "The Chem-Princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s blessing."

traits.locale_text: « Les chimioprinces rassemblent leurs milices à la hâte et se préparent à lancer une croisade purificatrice. Ils attendent la bénédiction de Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: “那些自称‘生化王子’的贵族正在紧急召集义勇军，时刻准备发起净化远征。他们正等待您的赐福。”
languages.original_text: "The Chem-Princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s blessing."

traits.locale_text: “那些自称‘生化王子’的贵族正在紧急召集义勇军，时刻准备发起净化远征。他们正等待您的赐福。”

languages.text: 「ケム・プリンスは急いで民兵を召集し、浄化の聖戦を始める準備をしています。彼らは陛下の祝福を待っています」
languages.original_text: "The Chem-Princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s blessing."

traits.locale_text: 「ケム・プリンスは急いで民兵を召集し、浄化の聖戦を始める準備をしています。彼らは陛下の祝福を待っています」

languages.text: "Die Chem-Prinzen stellen eilig Milizen auf und bereiten einen Kreuzzug der Läuterung vor. Sie erwarten den Segen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: "The Chem-Princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s blessing."

traits.locale_text: "Die Chem-Prinzen stellen eilig Milizen auf und bereiten einen Kreuzzug der Läuterung vor. Sie erwarten den Segen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: "Kimyevi Prensler, apar topar tugaylar çağırıyor ve bir arındırma cihadına başlamaya hazırlanıyor. Şu anda {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin lütfunu bekliyorlar."
languages.original_text: "The Chem-Princes are hastily summoning militias and getting ready to start a purifying crusade. They await Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s blessing."
